requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 21.04
  • Processor: 2ghz
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: integrated card
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: integrated
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 21.04
  • Processor: 2ghz
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1XXX series
  • Sound Card: integrated
